--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Pardon me for saying so, but I think that post may have been a mode. I'd like it to be examined as a mode. What I mean, is that the energy is coming out of the sky, so basically you're saying that your take out someone's character, since I'm sure that if it did minimal damage, Legendary Nemasis, you would feel offended, correct me if you wouldn't. All I'm saying is that your attack is basically hitting, and I just don't think that's good. If Alloran is okay with it though, then I've got no problem with the post, so I'll see what he says...
